station.name: RadioSpiral: ONE
station.longDesc:
Our primary stream, featuring a selected set of our library of captivating electronica, 24/7.
Featuring live DJs and live performances, every day of the week.

station.name: RadioSpiral: Inner Sanctum
station.longDesc: Our stream for listeners looking for longform, meditative music.

station.name: RadioSpiral: Outer Limits
station.longDesc: Our stream for listeners looking for more experimental, noisy, and quirky music.
